name: My Pet Talks!
description:
Bring you pet to life with this incredible talking pet app!

It's simple, fun and hilarious!
- Take a picture of your pet
- Speak into the microphone to record your voice
- Playback with your pet speaking! His/her mouth will move and it will look like they are talking!
- Share with your friends/family on Facebook or save it for yourself!
- Have your pet send your friends Christmas greetings or just be silly!

TIP: For best results connect the mouth and chin assignments
